channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server M50FCP Family products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server M50FCP Family products

item.title: CVE-2024-24981|2024-05-16T20:46:59.400Z -- n/a -- UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server M50FCP Family products
item.description: Improper input validation in PfrSmiUpdateFw driver in UEFI firmware for some Intel(R) Server M50FCP Family products may allow a privileged user to enable escalation of privilege via local access.
